inary Tract Infections in Children
How to prevent Urinary Tract Infections in Children ?,"If a child has a normal urinary tract, parents can help the child avoid UTIs by encouraging regular trips to the bathroom. The parents should make sure the child gets enough to drink if infrequent urination is a problem.
